name: Miner Rescue
description:
This is my game submission to the GameDev.tv Community Jam.

Locate and rescue the trapped miners while avoiding nasty creatures lurking about. Hurry before time runs out for both you and the miners!

Controls:

  • A, D or Left/Right Arrow keys
  • Space - Jump
  • F - Shoot
  • H - Fly

Source available: Project Source
